messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

links possible virus links hi would like take same actions here looks like some our clients understand links submitted by them hijacked please take look over link click whatever clicked need some assistance order if station was compromised cheers sent monday november re en portal personal borrow need loans overdrafts scheme best regards manager card electronic channels information public address cyprus el fax think before you print sent monday november re please send links where can check thank you developer en sent monday november hi message received what you think best regards manager card electronic channels information public address cyprus el fax think before you print sent monday november re hi talked issue still exists think something needs check regards digital coordinator digital public ave building th floor cyprus sent monday november creating lists with products for past weeks adding links them you below editing version since past few hours links have removed preview mode same above en portal personal borrow need loans overdrafts scheme happens panel ice widgets list created hub pages etc fixed some but these too best regards digital marketing officer marketing public corner avenue avenue cyprus direct line fax think before you print please note contains information intended only for individuals or entities addressed if you intended recipient or agent responsible for delivering intended recipient or have received error please notify immediately then completely delete including any attachments any other action taken reliance upon
